alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Trumbull, southeastern Ashtabula, southwestern Erie and western Crawford Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 647 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Albion to 7 miles northwest of Pymatuning to 7 miles west of Andover to Lordstown. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren, Meadville, Niles, Hubbard, Cortland, Edinboro, Newton Falls, Lordstown, Cambridge Springs, Kinsman, Waterford, Albion, Andover, Linesville, Vienna Center, Adamsville, Pymatuning Central, Harmonsburg, Pymatuning North and Leavittsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
